snippet.title: Simon the Sorcerer 4: Chaos Happens Trailer
snippet.description:
http://gog.com/game/simon_the_sorcerer_4_chaos_happens

Simon the Sorcerer – Chaos Happens is an adventure unlike any before. Simon has a tough time in his own reality. In the far-away Magic Kingdom, he was celebrated as a hero, but at home, he can't really succeed in anything, not even winning a quarrel over the remote control with his little brother – instead, said remote control hits him on the head and forces him into an involuntary midday nap.

While dreaming, a well-known young lady appears to him: Alix, granddaughter of the wizard Calypso, who first summoned Simon into the Magic Kingdom. She reveals that the kingdom is in terrible danger and that he is needed again to save its inhabitants.

Simon doesn't need to be told twice. He refuels his good old wardrobe capable of dimension traveling with an energy drink and starts off on his journey into the Magic Kingdom.
